Office Phone: 811 (ask to be connected to the QuitNow Program)
Primary Contact: Suzanne Gaby, Provincial Manager, QuitNow; Phone: 250.655.1983 * 250.589.5963; Email: quitnow@bc.lung.ca
Alternate Contact: Jack Boomer, Director, QuitNow; Phone: 250.721.4268; Fax: 250.721.4205; Email: jackboomer@shaw.ca
Primary Executive: Scott McDonald, President and CEO, BC Lung Association; Phone: 1.800.665.5864; Fax: 604.731.5810; Email: mcdonald@bc.lung.ca
Alternate Executive: Katrina van Bylandt, Communication Manager, BC Lung Association; Phone: 1.800.665.5864; Fax: 604.731.5810; Email: vanbylandt@bc.lung.ca
Service Details: - Provides smoking cessation services through an internet-based quit smoking service (with Expert Chat) and a confidential quit line- Provides access to a library of tools, tips and resources to help those thinking about quitting, planning to quit, starting to quit or working towards remaining tobacco-free- Offers a 14-week program which sends motivational text messages based on a person's quit date (standard text messaging/data rates may apply)
Hours: Office hours: Mon-Sun, 24 hoursCoaching by phone or expert chat: - Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 9:00pm- Sat, Sun and holidays: 9:00am - 5:00pm
How to Apply: - Quitline phone service can be accessed by phone or fax referral- Register through the website for online support- Enroll for text support through the website or text the word 'QUITNOW' to 654321 (text charges may apply)
Cost: No fees, except note that standard text messaging/data rates may apply for the text service
Address & Map: 2675 Oak StVancouver, BC     V6H 2K2View MapQuest Map
Languages: English ; Translations services available in 130 languages
Print Material: Promotional material is available for download from our website
